name: Interlude
wikiSummary: Interlude is the seventh track on Absolution. It is a distorted instrumental outro-duction to Falling Away With You and introduction to Hysteria, which samples the chord progression of the popular piece 'Adagio for Strings', by American composer Samuel Barber, on guitar with an extremely heavy fuzz effect.
wikiText: Interlude is the seventh track on Absolution. It is a distorted instrumental outro-duction to Falling Away With You and introduction to Hysteria, which samples the chord progression of the popular piece 'Adagio for Strings', by American composer Samuel Barber, on guitar with an extremely heavy fuzz effect.
